archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1982-2000

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply only to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.961, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1996 August 5.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's office, including the files of Associate Deans and Assistant Deans of Students.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Records, 1982-2000 Boxes 1-15
Series II: V. Shamim Sisson, Associate Dean of Students Boxes 15-16
Series III: Sybil R. Todd, Associate Dean of Students Box 16
Series IV: Annette Gibbs, Associate Dean of Students Boxes 16-19
Series V: Restricted Boxes 20-24
